idea-plugin.name: Code Outline 2
idea-plugin.description: Shows a zoomed out "outline" of your code while you're editing it.
idea-plugin.change-notes: + (Fixed in 0.5) Plugin does not work when running on Java 6 (JDK 6.0) + (Fixed in 0.5) Code Outline panel is not always rendered when open file or tab + (Fixed in 0.5) Exceptions when pointing to not existing place in code + (Fixed in 0.5) Not current panel opened if not last tab selected when opening project
